column6:
Operation at the time of reboot after blackout
0 = disable
1 = enable

H eating Zone1, enable Outgoing water set point  0=Fixed set point
1=Climatic curve

H eating Zone2, enable Outgoing water set point 0=Fixed set point
1=Climatic curve enabled

C ooling Zone1, enable Outgoing water set point  0=Fixed set point
1=Climatic curve enabled

C ooling Zone2, enable Outgoing water set point 0=Fixed set point
1=Climatic Curve Enabled

The HP unit turns ON/OFF based on 
0=Room set point 1
1=Water set point

Frost protection on room temperature
0=disable
1 = enable

Frost protection by outdoor temperature
0=disable
1 = enable

Frost protection based on Outgoing water temperature
0=disable
1 = enable

Secondary system circuit frost protection
0=disable
1 = enable

Conditions to be available Backup heaters
0= always enabled
1= dependent on Outdoor air temperature

Conditions to be available Backup heaters
0= always enabled
1= dependent on Outdoor air temperature
Terminal 19-18 : DHW remote contact 0=disable (Remote controller only) 1=enable

Terminal 41-42 : EHS (External heat source for space heating)
0=disable 1=enable
Terminal 43-44 : Heating/Cooling mode output 0=disable 1=Indication of Cooling mode (CLOSE=Cooling) 2=indication of Heating mode (CLOSE=Heating)

Terminal 46 : DHW Electric heater or Backup heater
 0=DHW Electric heater
1=Backup heater
